Layers¶

class simplenn.layer.Activation(activation, name='activation')¶

Wrapper layer for activation functions.

class simplenn.layer.Conv2d(input_shape, out_channels, kernel_size, stride=1, name='layer', padding='valid', bias=False)¶

Conv2D layer Input shape: (channels, height, width)

class simplenn.layer.Flatten(name='flatten')¶

Flatten layer.

class simplenn.layer.Linear(n_in, n_out, name='layer')¶

Linear Layer

Example:

 >>> a = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4, 5]).reshape(-1, 1)
 >>> l = Linear(1, 1)
 >>> print(l(a))
 array([[-0.29296088],
[-0.89514827],
[-1.49733566],
[-2.09952306],
[-2.70171045]])
